meanings.definition: To weave with a raised design
meanings.sent1: She enjoys brocading intricate patterns into her tapestries.
meanings.sent2: The artisan is brocading a beautiful floral motif onto the fabric.
meanings.sent3: The spider was brocading its web with delicate precision.
meanings.sent4: Her words brocaded a vivid picture of the past in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The brocading of colors created a mesmerizing effect on the cloth.

meanings.definition: A fabric with a raised design
meanings.sent1: The brocading on the dress added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate brocading on the antique tablecloth.
meanings.sent3: The cat curled up on the brocading of the cushion, finding it cozy.
meanings.sent4: The brocading of the fabric resembled a garden in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The brocading on the pillow felt luxurious to the touch.

meanings.definition: The act of weaving with a raised design
meanings.sent1: Her skillful brocading transformed plain fabric into a work of art.
meanings.sent2: The brocading of the tapestry showcased the weaver's talent.
meanings.sent3: The brocading of stories into the fabric made it come alive.
meanings.sent4: His brocading of emotions into the song touched the audience's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The brocading of history into the cloth captured the essence of the era.
